CustomValidation.JustLetters: Only alphabetic characters are allowed in
CustomValidation.JustNumbers: Only numeric characters are allowed in
CustomValidation.BeAPhone: Validate the phone number entered in
CustomValidation.MaxDifferenceInMinutesFirst: Validate that the entered date must be in the range of
CustomValidation.BeAShortDate: The date cannot contain hours, minutes and seconds in
CustomValidation.BeLessThanToDate: The date must be less than the current day in
CustomValidation.IsNotEmptyThenLenght: The date must be less than the current day in
CustomValidation.IdGreaterThan: The Id field must be greater than 0.

PagerValidation.PageNumber: The PageNumber field must be greater than 0.
PagerValidation.PageSize: The PageSize field must be greater than 0.

TaskValidation.AlreadyExists: The task already exists with the same id.
TaskValidation.NameLength: The size of the TaskName field must be between 3 and 100 characters.
TaskValidation.EmailLength: The size of the TaskEmail field must be between 3 and 100 characters.
TaskValidation.IdGreaterThan: The TaskId field must be greater than 0.
